DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Returns the EIP-712 domain separator for the EIP-2612 permit.

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the amount of tokens that `spender` can spend on behalf of `owner`.

approve(address,uint256).details: Sets `amount` as the allowance of `spender` over the caller's tokens. Emits a {Approval} event.

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the amount of tokens owned by `owner`.

params.partnerNFT: NFT address to transfer to this contract
params.partnerNFTId: Token ID of NFT to be transferred

params.partnerNFTIds: Array of token IDs for NFTs to be transferred
params.partnerNFTs: Array of NFT addresses to transfer to this contract

params.collateralNFT: NFT collection to use as collateral
params.collateralNFTId: Token Id of NFT to use as collateral

params.collateralNFTIds: Token IDs of NFTs to use as collateral
params.collateralNFTs: NFT collections to use as collateral

params._porridgeMultiple: Emissions rate of $PRG for $BERA in lending pool
params._startingPoolSize: Starting size of the lending pool

decimals().details: Returns the decimals places of the token.

params.user: Owner of loan to be liquidated

nonces(address).details: Returns the current nonce for `owner`. This value is used to compute the signature for EIP-2612 permit.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Sets `value` as the allowance of `spender` over the tokens of `owner`, authorized by a signed approval by `owner`. Emits a {Approval} event.

setMultisig(address).details: Used after deployment by deployment address

params._nftFairValues: Percentage each NFT is valued as a porportion of the total valuation
params._nfts: NFTs that are able to be borrowed against
params._totalValuation: Total valuation of all NFTs able to be borrowed against

totalSupply().details: Returns the amount of tokens in existence.

transfer(address,uint256).details: Transfer `amount` tokens from the caller to `to`. Requirements: - `from` must at least have `amount`. Emits a {Transfer} event.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers `amount` tokens from `from` to `to`. Note: Does not update the allowance if it is the maximum uint256 value. Requirements: - `from` must at least have `amount`. - The caller must have at least `amount` of allowance to transfer the tokens of `from`. Emits a {Transfer} event.

boost(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Locks partner NFT to receive boost on staking yield and discounted borrowing rates

boost(address[],uint256[],uint256).notice: Locks partner NFTs to receive boost on staking yield and discounted borrowing rates

emergencyWithdraw().notice: Allows the DAO to withdraw $BERA in case of emergency

extendBoost(uint256).notice: Extends the duration of an existing boost

getFairValues(address[]).notice: Returns the fair value of NFTs

honeyjarInterestClaim().notice: Allows the honeyjar to claim interest

liquidate(address,uint256).notice: Liquidates overdue loans by paying $BERA to purchase collateral

lookupBoost(address).notice: Returns the details of a boost

lookupLoan(address,uint256).notice: Returns the details of a specific loan

lookupLoans(address).notice: Returns the details of all loans originated from user

multisigInterestClaim().notice: Allows the multisig to claim interest

name().notice: Returns the name of the $gBERA token

setMultisig(address).notice: Changes the address of the multisig address

setProtocolInterestRate(uint256).notice: Allows the DAO to adjust the interest rate for the protocol

setValue(uint256,address[],uint256[]).notice: Allows the DAO to adjust the valuation of the NFTs to borrow against

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the $gBERA token
